name: Food And Drink 60 Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: When a drink calls for a dash about how many drops are indicated?
What color is a Remy Martin bottle?
Which of the following are quanties of wine measured in?
questions.explanation:
Pipe.

	It is a liquid measure of half a tun ( about 126 gallons ).

questions.text: The greatest amount of which grain is used in the production of bourbon?

questions.explanation:
True.

	It is made of wine, water and lemon juice.

questions.text: At what age does a chicken become a fowl?

questions.explanation:
Fruit.

	Native to China and Indochina.

questions.text: From what part of the plant do we get cauliflower?
questions.explanation:
Bud.

	It's a form of cabbage in the mustard family.

questions.text: A soup containing tripe is called Menudo?
questions.explanation:
True.

	It is also called tripe stew.

questions.text: What does the dish choucroute garnie contain?
questions.explanation:
Sauerkraut.

	Sauerkraut is often served with smoked meats and sausage. Another such dish is called Berner Platte.
